data.text:
Цены

Tuition (Monthly or Weekly):

Tuition includes educational programs, supplemental programs, breakfast, lunch, afternoon snacks and dinner. Tuition Payment is due by the 1st of each month or on Friday of each previous week.

Fees & Discounts:

Vacation & Absences:

After your child has attended continuously for one year, your child is allowed a maximum of two (2) weeks vacation each year that charges won’t be paid.

A child attending for one or more days during a week is charged for full week.

Guidelines:

Please bring your child’s physical & immunization records at the time of enrollment. Up-to-date records must be on file throughout your child’s enrollment.

Please do not let your child bring gum, food, or toys to Alenka Your Learning Kids Academy.

For the protection of all the children, we cannot to allow a child with a communicable disease to attend.

Holidays:

We are closed on the following holidays:

New Year’s Day and Day before – December 31, January 1st

George Washington’s Birthday (commonly known as Presidents Day) Monday – February 18th

Independence Day – Thursday, July 4th + 1 day

Labor Day – Monday, September 2

Columbus Day – Monday, October 14th (teacher conference)

Thanksgiving Day 2 days– Thursday, November 25th

Christmas Day and day following – December 24th

*Tuition will not be prorated on a holiday week or in the event we are closed to inclement weather.
